text: Melani Dias (born 14 November 1991) is a Brazilian water polo player. She was part of the Brazilian women's water polo team at World Championships, most recently at the 2013 World Aquatics Championships, 2015 World Aquatics Championships, and 2017 World Aquatics Championships. == References == ==Other websites== * Simon Barclay (17 March 2016). 16th World Aquatics Championships - Kazan 2015. title: Melani Dias
